PHRASE.LANG: (Torso/pants/shoes) The combat outfit of Starkiller, Darth Vader's now fugitive apprentice, who is on a journey to discover his identity and to reunite with his one true love, Juno Eclipse.[#Legal]
(Torse/pantalon/chaussures) La tenue de combat de Starkiller, l'apprenti dorénavant fugitif de Dark Vador, en quête de son identité et à la recherche de son véritable amour, Juno Eclipse.[#Legal]

(Oberkörper/Hose/Schuhe) Das Kampfoutfit von Starkiller, Darth Vaders inzwischen flüchtigem Schüler, der auf der Suche nach seiner Identität ist und seine wahre Liebe, Juno Eclipse, wiedersehen will.[#Legal]
(Busto/pantaloni/scarpe) La tenuta da combattimento di Starkiller, l'apprendista ora fuggitivo di Darth Vader, che è alla ricerca della sua identità e del suo vero amore, Juno Eclipse.[#Legal]

(Torso/pantalones/zapatos) El traje de combate de Starkiller, el aprendiz, ahora fugitivo, de Darth Vader, que está en un viaje para descubrir su identidad y para reunirse con su verdadero amor, Juno Eclipse.[#Legal]
(Torso/pants/shoes) The combat outfit of Starkiller, Darth Vader's now fugitive apprentice, who is on a journey to discover his identity and to reunite with his one true love, Juno Eclipse.[#Legal]
(Torso/pants/shoes) The combat outfit of Starkiller, Darth Vader's now fugitive apprentice, who is on a journey to discover his identity and to reunite with his one true love, Juno Eclipse.[#Legal]
